{"@event_create_date":"2025-05-09T07:21:42.435Z","detection_date":"2025-05-09T07:21:42.435+00:00","rule_name":"Unsigned DLL Loaded by LSASS","rule_id":"06d8e9db-d23a-480a-9a16-c208449db13b","msg":"Detects when an unsigned DLL or EXE is loaded by the LSASS process.
Attackers may try to load DLLs in LSASS as an attempt to dump credentials off the memory.
This could also be a legitimate third party DLL addin features to the machine authentication mechanism.
It is recommended to identify the unsigned DLL to determine its maliciousness and document legitimate third party DLLs.
","type":"rtlogs","alert_subtype":"process","alert_type":"sigma","status":"new","level":"medium","level_int":30,"confidence":"moderate","confidence_int":200,"execution":0,"quarantine":4,"detection":{},"details_library":{"image_loaded":"C:\Program Files\Common Files\System\en-US\btaph_u.dll","size":340480,"hashes":{"md5":"68b329da9893e34099c7d8ad5cb9c940","sha1":"adc83b19e793491b1c6ea0fd8b46cd9f32e592fc","sha256":"01ba4719c80b6fe911b091a7c05124b64eeece964e09c058ef8f9805daca546b"},"stacktrace":"","stacktrace_minimal":"","pe_info":{"company_name":""}}}
